subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Chad Pennington has several reminders of the play against the Jaguars that ended his season last September, including the scar on his throwing shoulder, where doctors repaired a torn rotator cuff.
snippet: Chad Pennington has several reminders of the play against the Jaguars that ended his season last September, including the scar on his throwing shoulder, where doctors repaired a torn rotator cuff.
